about_the_game:
In this Special Demo version, you can enjoy the following elements.

・Some of the puzzle gimmicks that can be enjoyed in the full version

　You can experience the same puzzle and gimmick elements as the beginning of the full version.

・A special story exclusive to the Special Demo version which is different from the full version

　We have prepared a completely different story with a different setting and different characters from the full version, which is scheduled to be released on April 24.

　The two players will be part of a research team that has crash-landed on an unknown planet, and they must return to Earth.

・Estimated time to finish the game

　Gameplay is estimated to be around 1 hour.

----------

*Players must communicate with each other to play this game. If you are not playing in the same location, you will need another communication method, such as voice chat. Before buying the game, please keep in mind that the game itself does not provide a separate communication method.

BOKURA: planet is a Hidden Objective co-op adventure where players communicate with each other to solve puzzles and progress on their journey.

Each player is given a different objective and they must progress without letting the other player know about your intentions. 

In this demo version, you can experience the core Hidden Objective co-op adventure system. However, the story differs from the full game set to release on April 25, 2025, offering a unique and exclusive experience.

 

What does it feel like to cooperate with different intentions at heart…?

Please enjoy this new gaming experience.

【Demo Special Story】 

In the demo you play as crew members of a research ship and find your way back to Earth. 

【Hidden Objective co-op adventure】

The “Hidden Objective” will be presented to each player once you proceed a little in this world. The details for each objective is only told to each player, and the other player you are playing with will not know what you are up to.

On a journey of cooperation, what is the other player pondering?

This special demonstration for the game lets you casually enjoy, the tension of a story unfolding as each player's intentions cross.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

name: BOKURA: planet  Special Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Back to the same planet, together... That's all I wanted..." BOKURA: planet is a two-player puzzle adventure that explores cooperative gaming. Players take on the role of the crew on a space exploration ship as they try to escape from a planet where they have crash-landed on.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
